one_reviews_text:
It is exactly what it shows on the page. There's no catch or new obstacles to keep you on your toes, it's just making a hoop not touch a line. It might work as a time-killing mobile game to whip out when you're bored, but as a VR game, don't bother. I'd say only children would find enjoyment in it, but even children would get bored by it.

Only positives I can give are it functions properly, and the fact it's free means you won't be wasting anything but time on it.

Its alright, its kinda really simple for a game that came out a day ago, it is fine game though does get boring after like 1/2 minutes (you should add different modes so it doesnt get to bland so you can mix it up a bit) i do like that it is made simple for very low end computers (one more thing you should add a leaderboard)

This is really fun and relaxing. I am kind of addicted~ 
Can't help picking it up whenever I got 2 or 5 minutes free while working from home. I shared it with my son, and he said he cannot let it go either, haha
Nothing bad about the game, it's simply just guiding a hoop with your controller without touching a line. It's free as well!
A good way of stress release! So relaxing...

It's fun, but it's amazing that vr has already become popular enough for individuals, not companies, to make such simple games with vr.

재미는 물론이고, 벌써 전문 기업이 아닌 개인이 VR로 게임을 만들 정도로 VR이 대중화되었다는 것에 놀라울 뿐이다.

I usually listen to lo-fi when I play alone but I enjoy way more to play with my family for stress relief you know though it is a very messy game there is usually red stains on the carpet when I’m done playing 10 out of 10 would recommend it also helps me to Forget about my cancer ü
